name: EVAMP001-THS-QA-ITP-0001 - Clear and Grubbing

name: 2 - Management Plans submitted and approved as per PMP
3 - Inspection Test Plan (ITP) submitted and approved
4 - Lot Register/ WBS submitted and approved
5 - Erosion and sediment control plan approved
Conformance Criteria - Approved erosion and sediment control plan
6 - Check existing services and dial before you dig
Conformance Criteria - DBYD certificate and EP
Specification Clause - Excavation Permit (EP) Doc no.
Conformance Criteria - GDP permit with work packs
8 - Area of works pegged and clearly defined to GDP. Pre- strip area survey pick-up
Conformance Criteria - Clearing pegs installed at nominal intervals to ensure no over-clearing
Specification Clause - EVAMP001-EVA- 7340-PE-PRM-0001 to ensure no over-clearing

Conformance Criteria - All areas to be pre-cleared prior to clearing operations.

Conformance Criteria - Spotter/ catcher in place during clearing operations
○ Habitat vegetation, threatened species and cultural heritage areas demarcated

Conformance Criteria - All control measures for erosion sediment control need to be implemented after clearing has been completed.

2 - Management Plans submitted and approved as per PMP
3 - Inspection Test Plan (ITP) submitted and approved
4 - Lot Register/ WBS submitted and approved
5 - Check existing services and dial before you dig
Conformance Criteria - Approved erosion and sediment control plan
Conformance Criteria - DBYD certificate and EP
Specification Clause - Excavation Permit (EP) Doc no.
7 - Area of works pegged and clearly defined to GDP. Pre-strip area survey pick-up
Conformance Criteria - Boundary pegs installed at nominal intervals to ensure no over-stripping
8 - Stripped topsoil load and hauled to nominated stockpile location
Conformance Criteria - Stockpile locations located 40m from watercourses and not exceed 2m in height.
○ Native seeding of topsoil stockpiles as agreed with Company.
○ The provisional depth of stripping shall be 150 mm unless shown otherwise on the drawings
9 - Topsoil location, destination and quantity catalogued.
Conformance Criteria - A topsoil inventory will be maintained with information on topsoil volumes and stockpile locations
10 - Surface level check/post-strip area and volume survey pick-up
Conformance Criteria - DXF file submitted to Company and inventory updated
11 - Works completed and update ITP/ Lot Register/ MDR and close out of GDP
Approved by THIESS QA Representative / THIESS Project Manager / Client
1 - Drawings supplied most current IFC Retrieved from InEight
2 - Management Plans submitted and approved as per PMP
3 - Inspection Test Plan (ITP) submitted and approved
4 - Lot Register/ WBS submitted and approved
5 - Check existing services and dial before you dig
Conformance Criteria - Approved erosion and sediment control plan
6 - Underlying lot & ITP signed off and conforming
Conformance Criteria - Topsoil stripping ITP signed off
7 - Removal and replacement of unsuitable material
Conformance Criteria - Determination of unsuitable material by the Level 1 GITA or Principal is required prior to the removal of any unsuitable material.
○ Unsuitable material shall be disposed as directed by the company or in areas specified in the annexure.
Conformance Criteria - Area to be ripped and conditioned to suit a minimum CBR value of 10.
Specification Clause - C10 and C14 107501-EB-00000-27280-001 Rev A
9 - Proof-roll subgrade surface prior to placement of embankment fill
Conformance Criteria - All subgrades and foundations shall be proof rolled under a standard 8 tonne axle load to confirm that, in the principal’s opinion, deflections are negligible.
10 - Surface level check/ and survey pick-up
Conformance Criteria - Surface level as per Table 10 C15
11 - Works completed and update ITP/ Lot Register/ MDR and close out of GDP
Approved by THIESS QA Representative / THIESS Project Manager / Client
